item.title: Creating Google Document by Converting PDF and Image Files with OCR using Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists This is a sample script for creating Google Document by converting PDF and image files with OCR using Google Apps Script. Before you run this sample script, please install a GAS library of FetchApp. function sample() { var fileId = "### fileId of PDF file and image files ###"; var metadata = { name: "sampleDocument", // Filename of created Google Document mimeType: MimeType.GOOGLE_DOCS // MimeType of Google Document }; var fileBlob = DriveApp.
